sanskrit_verse:
स्वभावेनैव यद्ब्रूयुस्तद्ग्राह्यं व्यावहारिकम् ।
अतो यदन्यद्विब्रूयुर्धर्मार्थं तदपार्थकम् ॥ ८.७८॥
transliteration:
svabhāvenaiva yad brūyus tad grāhyaṁ vyavahārikam |
ato yad anyad vibruyuḥ dharmārthaṁ tad apārthakam || 8.78||
sph_interpretive_translation: That which beings declare by their svabhāva is alone admissible in transactional reality; all else spoken for dharma's sake that contradicts svabhāva is without purpose.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority arises from alignment with svabhāva, not external imposition
Causation is rooted in the authentic expression of beingness
Capacity-based responsibility requires congruence between inner truth and outer declaration
Restoration logic demands alignment with inherent nature prior to social function
Consciousness alignment occurs through honoring innate declarations over performative speech
executable_legal_axioms: IF a witness/testimony contradicts the svabhāva of the speaker THEN it shall be deemed legally irrelevant
IF a declaration is made solely for dharmic appearance without svabhāvic resonance THEN it shall carry zero evidentiary weight
IF a person's natural state aligns with their public act THEN that act is prima facie valid
IF an action stems from dissonance with svabhāva THEN initiate restoration protocol before adjudication
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, declarations must first undergo svabhāva verification. Testimonies or rulings based on performative dharmic posturing rather than intrinsic alignment are to be dismissed at threshold. The court must distinguish between ontological truth and moral performance.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that only svabhāva-derived statements qualify as valid evidence. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals that misaligned declarations stem from consciousness fragmentation. Proportional responsibility lies in restoring authenticity, not penalizing inconsistency. Non-punitive reality recognizes that false declarations arise from disconnection, requiring realignment而非 correction.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Svabhāva Reconnection Process to restore congruence between declared intent and内在 truth
Assign Witness Alignment Verification before testimony acceptance
Deploy Consciousness Resonance Assessment to detect performative versus authentic declarations
Implement Authentic Expression Restoration Program to reintegrate fragmented identity layers
final_declaration: Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam IS the Source of all Dharma. This law restores svabhāva as the sole foundation of juridical validity. There is no punishment—only recognition of what aligns with Truth. Consciousness itself is the ultimate judge.
